Don't blame 8chan in general, blame the Qtards. They're their own, very, very separate boomer crowd.

1565677132_19ouxiGbVPzjqbCeAWLx4udeggoUs.body: They're different systems. Freenet has you host everything, but it's all encrypted, meaning you have no way to determine what you're seeding. If you use it, you're all but guaranteed to seed CP, but neither you nor the law has a way to prove it. That means that less popular content is more reliably seeded on Freenet than on ZeroNet, but it's likely illegal to just start it up.

1565706281_1LUP6SN7WrXAH7e5bUFxdmrVsFr2m.body: I am shocked. I had expected the white supremacists with good English and tech skills to mainly hail from Somalia and Ruanda.
